Update Phase Status To Closed(not won)

fieldUpdates.description: Used this data to bypass the compitetor when ever the oppty got opened
fieldUpdates.name: Update Previous Value OF SalesOutcome

fieldUpdates.description: Update Unweighted amount as per the OIF EUR Values(Req:136)
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( TEXT(Sales_Outcome__c) , 'Won', Positive_OIF_EUR__c, 'Won (Requested)', Positive_OIF_EUR__c, '' , Positive_OIF_EUR__c , Negative_OIF_EUR__c )
fieldUpdates.name: Update Total OIF EUR To Amount

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( TEXT(Sales_Outcome__c) , 'Won', Positive_OIF__c, 'Won (Requested)', Positive_OIF__c, '' , Positive_OIF__c, Negative_OIF__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Total OIF To Amount

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( TEXT(Sales_Outcome__c) , 'Won', OIF_Value_Won_USD__c, 'Won (Requested)', OIF_Value_Won_USD__c, '' , OIF_Value_Won_USD__c, OIF_Value_Cancel_USD__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Total OIF To Unweigted USD
Update the Automated Flag to False

fieldUpdates.description: Planned/Actual Decision date should be auto populated by the Decision Date when the Sales Outcome is updated to Cancelled
